snippet: U.S. television singing contest "The X Factor," led by judge and show creator Simon Cowell, was canceled on Friday after three seasons, network Fox said on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Fox Cancels 'X Factor' as Simon Cowell Returns to UK Version
headline.main: Fox Cancels 'X Factor' as Simon Cowell Returns to UK Version

lead_paragraph: U.S. television singing contest "The X Factor," led by judge and show creator Simon Cowell, was canceled on Friday after three seasons, network Fox said on Friday.
